version_description:
We apologize for all the inconvenience with the crashes from the two previous versions. Here is the update that should finally fix it. If your app still crashes, please reinstall the app, that will fix everything.

• Fixes to fatal crashes
• Other bug fixes
• Preview feature

We appreciate every feedback. Send us an email (hello@ambeeapp.com) and let us know what you think of this update.

Thank you for being part of the Ambee community.

Lots of bug fixes:
• broken scene images
• losing data (credits, scenes, settings,…)
• improvements to connectivity to the bridge
• crashes
• performance improvements
• size optimazation

We appreciate every feedback. Send us an email (hello@ambeeapp.com) and let us know what you think of this update.

Thank you for being part of the Ambee community.
Minor enhancements
Minor enhancements

• Crash fixes

We appreciate every feedback. Send us an email (hello@ambeeapp.com) and let us know what you think of this update.

Thank you for being part of the Ambee community.

Minor enhancements

We appreciate every feedback. Send us an email (hello@ambeeapp.com) and let us know what you think of this update.

Thank you for being part of the Ambee community.

Minor enhancements

We appreciate every feedback. Send us an email (hello@ambeeapp.com) and let us know what you think of this update.

Thank you for being part of the Ambee community.

• Bug fixes

We appreciate every feedback. Send us an email (hello@ambeeapp.com) and let us know what you think of this update.

Thank you for being part of the Ambee community.

• Long-awaited BRIGHTNESS Adjustment Slider (we've worked out every detail on this: adjusting intensity is very responsive, yet still elegant)
• Long-awaited SOUND Adjustment Slider for Animations with sound (including Mute option)
• Removed confusing animation assignment to light zones
• Minor design enhancements (hamburger button added for better access of Light Zones, active Light Zone has bold font now, better icons)
• More elegant messages of connection to the bridge
• New onboarding
• New naming. From now on, we started calling our Dynamic Light Scenes: Light Animations

We appreciate every feedback. Send us an email (hello@ambeeapp.com) and let us know what you think of this update.

Thank you for being part of the Ambee community.

• Ambee fixes the issue which caused overriding after the lights were turned off from other sources (official hue app, Siri, Alexa, hue tap, hue dimmer…)
• Login is now separated from Signup
• New icon
• Better light transitions when switching Light Animations
• According to your feedback, we changed the background settings
• Now you can select your light zone first, then Light Animation
• Other minor design enhancements
• Bug fixes
• PS: Since the previous update (1.0.32), Ambee remembers your lastly used light zone and selects that one as the default one.

Writing a nice App Store review makes Ambee more visible to others. Therefore, it has an important impact on our development. Thanks for doing so :)

Tomas, founder of Ambee

PS: Please contact me personally (tomas@ambeeapp.com) before writing any negative review. I respond fast :) Thanks. Tomas.

• Bridge connection is now saved on your iPhone, so you once you pushed the button, you won’t have to do it any more :) To save you some finger clicks.
• Icon little correction
• Bug fixes

Writing a nice App Store review makes Ambee more visible to others. Therefore, it has an important impact on our development. Thanks for doing so :)

Tomas, founder of Ambee

PS: Please contact me personally (tomas@ambeeapp.com) before writing any negative review. I respond fast :) Thanks. Tomas.

• Bug that disabled some users to reconnect to bridge fixed. With that I also apologize to Ben, Manny, Ruggero, Rickie, Ian.
• Minor enhancements

Writing a nice App Store review makes Ambee more visible to others. Therefore, it has an important impact on our development. Thanks for doing so :)

Tomas, founder of Ambee

PS: Please contact me personally (tomas@ambeeapp.com) before writing any negative review. I try to respond fast :) Thanks.

• We had to fix that nasty bug that disabled some users to reconnect to bridge again. Sorry about all the inconveniences. With that I apologize to Ben, Manny, Ruggero, Rickie, Ian, Joey, Mr. Luis, Joe, Alan, Luca, Joshua, Ali and others.
• Minor enhancements

Writing a nice App Store review makes Ambee more visible to others. Therefore, it has an important impact on our development. Thanks for doing so :)

Tomas, founder of Ambee

PS: Please contact me personally (tomas@ambeeapp.com) before writing any negative review. I try to respond fast :) Thanks.

PS: We are preparing new dynamic light animations right now :) some including exciting sounds :)

We are super excited to share with you that we have created one of the best Light Animations so far (most of them come with sound in the background). Here they are:

• The Pumpkin Day (of course, we had to make a special one, just for the holidays)
• In Venice (for the romantic souls :))
• Transamerica at Sleep (for all the hardworking maniacs :) located in the Bay Area or anywhere on the planet)
• The Rock&Roll Drinks (for the tough guys and gals)
• The Dusky Road (for the ones who are feeling melancholy)
• The Reggae Vibes (for all of us who just wanna chill, like they do in Jamaica - ya man)

Oh, and please, if you like this update, write us a nice App Store review since it makes Ambee more visible to others. Thanks a lot :)
Tomas, founder of Ambee

P.S. Please, contact me personally (tomas@ambeeapp.com) before writing any negative review. I respond fast :) Thanks.

Some bug fixing has come :)

• Muting the audio fixed
• Background disabling now fixed
• Other minor enhancements


If you like our app, write a nice App Store review since it makes Ambee more visible to others. Thanks a lot :)

Tomas, founder of Ambee

P.S. Please, contact me personally (tomas@ambeeapp.com) before writing any negative review. I respond fast :) Thanks.

• Static scenes now for free as a Christmas Present :)
• New Icon
• Other minor enhancements

P.S. Please, contact me personally (tomas@ambeeapp.com) before writing any negative review, since it affects our visibility. I respond fast :) Thanks. Tomas, CEO of Ambee.
• minor enhancements while cooking new animations for you that will come soon :)
• under the hood preparations for the new exciting animations that are coming in the following update (1.1.4)

We're publishing six New Dynamic Light Animations. They were really tough to create in such an authentic shape. Here they are:

• Fire Canvasses (relaxing)
• Before the Hurricane (relaxing)
• Kill Your Mama (relaxing)
• Refreshing Rain (relaxing)
• Flirtatious Sun (relaxing)
• Devoured by Light (romantic)

Have fun, our friends :)
Tomas, Vitalii & other dozen people that contributed

P.S. Big thanks to Rob v. d. G. for his help on the newest animations. We have better colors thanks to him. Cheers, brother :)

We're fixing a bug that messed up Preview Feature of our new 'Devoured by Light' animation

P.S. Big thanks to Rob v. d. G. for his help on the newest animations. We have better colors thanks to him. Cheers, brother :)
